name: W.M.L.F
description:
W.M.L.F takes you to a dystopian landscape, where you take the role of a Space cowboy with a teleporting lasso. Make loops of rope and activate the teleporter to send whatever is inside to the teleporting destination. But, who are you and why are you here, doing this?

How to play:

 (Keyboard)

  • WASD / Arrow Keys to move
  • Shift to sprint (When available)
  • J  to deploy a new rope
  • K near the rope end flashing marker to catch the other end of the rope
  • Space to activate the teleport

(Joystick):

  •  Left Stick / Arrow Keys to move
  • RB to sprint (When available)
  • A to deploy a new rope
  • X  near the rope end flashing marker to catch the other end of the rope
  • Left Trigger to activate the teleport
  1. Deploy a rope with J or A in joystick Make a loop with the rope and catch the cows insisde,
  2. Close the loop using K or X in joystick  near the flash indicator at the opossite end of the rope to close the loop  this will activate the rope and teleport them to the central pen!.

 Meet each door requirement to advance to the next area.
